dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7303 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 129 Walnut Street in Corning, New York, as the “Amory Amo Houghton, Jr. Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Reed introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 129 Walnut Street in Corning, New York, as the Amory Amo Houghton, Jr. Post Office Building.

section.header: Amory “Amo” Houghton, Jr. Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 129 Walnut Street in Corning, New York, shall be known and designated as the Amory Amo Houghton, Jr. Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Amory Amo Houghton, Jr. Post Office Building.
